# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Security Officer
The Security Officer is responsible for patrolling the station, arresting criminals, and securing the station from threats. They are the police during normal operations and the military when the station is under attack.
Be mindful of the current Alert Level, and respond accordingly.
## Do - Patrol the station, and respond to emergencies. - Arrest criminals. - Be aware of the current Alert Level. - Secure the station from threats. - Make yourself aware of Space Law. - Lead by example.
## Don't - Act outside of the Alert Level (e.g. performing random searches while the station is Green). - Use lethal force to arrest criminals unless the situation requires it.
